MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G4 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Braid Square and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:48PM. Our engineers have arrived at St Peters Street substation are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:11 PM on Sunday, 07 March 2021.
